00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * This file provides support for the processor local scratch memory.
00044  * Scratch memory is byte addressable - all addresses are byte addresses.
00045  *
00046  *
00047  * <hr>$Revision: 135592 $<hr>
00048  *
00049  *
00050  */
00051 
00052 #ifndef __CVMX_SCRATCH_H__
00053 #define __CVMX_SCRATCH_H__
00054 
00055 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00056 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00057 extern "C" {
00058 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 /* Note: This define must be a long, not a long long in order to compile
00062         without warnings for both 32bit and 64bit. */
00063 #define CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE       (-32768l)   /* 0xffffffffffff8000 */
00064 
00065 /* Scratch line for LMTST/LMTDMA on Octeon3 models */
00066 #ifdef CVMX_CAVIUM_OCTEON3
00067 #define CVMX_PKO_LMTLINE 2ull
00068 #endif
00069 
00070 /**
00071  * Reads an 8 bit value from the processor local scratchpad memory.
00072  *
00073  * @param address byte address to read from
00074  *
00075  * @return value read
00076  */
00077 static inline uint8_t cvmx_scratch_read8(uint64_t address)
00078 {
00079     return *CASTPTR(volatile uint8_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address);
00080 }
00081 
00082 /**
00083  * Reads a 16 bit value from the processor local scratchpad memory.
00084  *
00085  * @param address byte address to read from
00086  *
00087  * @return value read
00088  */ static inline uint16_t cvmx_scratch_read16(uint64_t address)
00089 {
00090     return *CASTPTR(volatile uint16_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address);
00091 }
00092 
00093 /**
00094  * Reads a 32 bit value from the processor local scratchpad memory.
00095  *
00096  * @param address byte address to read from
00097  *
00098  * @return value read
00099  */
00100 static inline uint32_t cvmx_scratch_read32(uint64_t address)
00101 {
00102     return *CASTPTR(volatile uint32_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address);
00103 }
00104 
00105 /**
00106  * Reads a 64 bit value from the processor local scratchpad memory.
00107  *
00108  * @param address byte address to read from
00109  *
00110  * @return value read
00111  */
00112 static inline uint64_t cvmx_scratch_read64(uint64_t address)
00113 {
00114     return *CASTPTR(volatile uint64_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address);
00115 }
00116 
00117 /**
00118  * Writes an 8 bit value to the processor local scratchpad memory.
00119  *
00120  * @param address byte address to write to
00121  * @param value   value to write
00122  */
00123 static inline void cvmx_scratch_write8(uint64_t address, uint64_t value)
00124 {
00125     *CASTPTR(volatile uint8_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address) = (uint8_t) value;
00126 }
00127 
00128 /**
00129  * Writes a 32 bit value to the processor local scratchpad memory.
00130  *
00131  * @param address byte address to write to
00132  * @param value   value to write
00133  */
00134 static inline void cvmx_scratch_write16(uint64_t address, uint64_t value)
00135 {
00136     *CASTPTR(volatile uint16_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address) = (uint16_t) value;
00137 }
00138 
00139 /**
00140  * Writes a 16 bit value to the processor local scratchpad memory.
00141  *
00142  * @param address byte address to write to
00143  * @param value   value to write
00144  */
00145 static inline void cvmx_scratch_write32(uint64_t address, uint64_t value)
00146 {
00147     *CASTPTR(volatile uint32_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address) = (uint32_t) value;
00148 }
00149 
00150 /**
00151  * Writes a 64 bit value to the processor local scratchpad memory.
00152  *
00153  * @param address byte address to write to
00154  * @param value   value to write
00155  */
00156 static inline void cvmx_scratch_write64(uint64_t address, uint64_t value)
00157 {
00158     *CASTPTR(volatile uint64_t, CVMX_SCRATCH_BASE + address) = value;
00159 }
00160 
00161 #ifdef  __cplusplus
00162 /* *INDENT-OFF* */
00163 }
00164 /* *INDENT-ON* */
00165 #endif
00166 
00167 #endif /* __CVMX_SCRATCH_H__ */
